item.title: Flight Crew/Supernumerary Escape Devices – Escape Harnesses Freighter without Draw-Through Smoke Detection System One Upper Deck Slide is Operative

remarks.para: May be inoperative or missing provided:

numlitem.para: One Upper Deck Door/Slide is operative,
The number of flight crewmembers plus supernumeraries is limited to the number of operative escape reels/harnesses installed, and
Flight deck/upper deck occupants are limited to the number of operative escape reels/harnesses (4 escape reels and harnesses).

placard.para: Placard below captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel stating: "____# ESCAPE HARNESS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Remove inoperative escape harness from stowage box.
